Text: Delavan Leonard Pierson:  He was the first son of Arthur Tappan Pierson who was an American Presbyterian pastor, Christian Leader, and missionary to Korea where A. T. Pierson established the Pierson Memorial Bible School(present Pyeongtaek University) in Seoul in 1912.
